sentence.Network_en: A set period of fasting is supposed to bring us closer to godliness.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说定期斋戒会让我们更虔诚。

sentence.Network_en: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要有善行.这才与自称是敬神的女人相宜.

sentence.Network_en: Cleanliness which comes next to godliness , if not before it.

entry.def: Godliness is the quality of being godly.
If someone says that cleanliness is next to godliness, they are referring to the idea that people have a moral duty to keep themselves and their homes clean.

means.word_mean: 1. piety by virtue of being a godly person
